master.name: Microsoft Office 365
master.installScript:
# Installation Microsoft Office 365 via Office Deployment Tool
$odtUrl = 'https://download.microsoft.com/download/2/7/A/27AF1BE6-DD20-4CB4-B154-EBAB8A7D4A7E/officedeploymenttool_17830-20162.exe'
$odtPath = "$env:TEMP\ODTSetup.exe"
$odtExtractPath = "$env:TEMP\ODT"
$configXml = "$odtExtractPath\config.xml"

Write-Host "  Téléchargement Office Deployment Tool..." -ForegroundColor Gray
Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $odtUrl -OutFile $odtPath -UseBasicParsing

Write-Host "  Extraction ODT..." -ForegroundColor Gray
New-Item -Path $odtExtractPath -ItemType Directory -Force | Out-Null
Start-Process -FilePath $odtPath -ArgumentList "/quiet","/extract:$odtExtractPath" -Wait -NoNewWindow

# Configuration Office 365 Business
$xmlContent = @'
<Configuration>
  <Add OfficeClientEdition="64" Channel="Current">
    <Product ID="O365BusinessRetail">
      <Language ID="fr-fr" />
      <ExcludeApp ID="Groove" />
      <ExcludeApp ID="Lync" />
    </Product>
  </Add>
  <Display Level="None" AcceptEULA="TRUE" />
  <Property Name="AUTOACTIVATE" Value="1" />
</Configuration>
'@

Set-Content -Path $configXml -Value $xmlContent -Encoding UTF8

Write-Host "  Installation Office 365 (15-30 minutes)..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
$setupPath = "$odtExtractPath\setup.exe"
$installProc = Start-Process -FilePath $setupPath -ArgumentList "/configure","`"$configXml`"" -Wait -NoNewWindow -PassThru

if ($installProc.ExitCode -eq 0) {
    Write-Host "    [OK] Office 365 installé" -ForegroundColor Green
    # Nettoyage
    Remove-Item -Path $odtPath -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
    Remove-Item -Path $odtExtractPath -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
} else {
    Write-Host "    [ERREUR] Échec installation Office 365 (Exit Code: $($installProc.ExitCode))" -ForegroundColor Red
}
